attributes.action: Increase state pension in line with national minimum wage
attributes.additional_details: The state pension is amongst the worst in Europe and not enough to even cover everyday living costs etc, let alone holidays.
attributes.background: Review and amend state pensions to a level that is at least compatible with the national minimum wage

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/640356
